answerText: virtual particles [or virtual photons][10] Virtual particles appear in this type of radiation believed to be emitted by black holes, which is named after a paraplegic British physicist.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 9 | 11 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A vacuum can be thought of as an infinite number of these particles. For 10 points each: [10] Name these particles that are represented by internal lines on Feynman diagrams and can exist due to the time-energy uncertainty principle.
